message: Hi Bob, I'm offering you a great opportunity to purchase my product. Given its value, I'm proposing an initial price of $14,000.
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $12,000. Can you meet me in the middle?
Bob, I appreciate your interest. While $12,000 is a fair offer, I know the true value of this product. How about we settle at $13,000?
I'm still a bit hesitant, but I'm willing to meet you halfway. How about we settle at $12,500?
